name: Shroom Into Action
description:
This is a game made in 1 week for the Blackthornprod Game Jam 2021.

My main focus was to build an interactive tutorial and introduction to the game, instead of a wall of text with controls, and to have a much nicer UI as opposed to a black background with white buttons.

Basic Controls:

Move left: A or Left Arrow

Move Right: D or Right Arrow

Jump: Space

Continue with dialog: Space

Quit to main menu: Q

For the most part you can follow the lighting as it will suggest where you should go. There are also some arrows to help out as well.
